## Directory Structure
- compendium/: Canonical reference materials
- codex/: In-world documents and lore codices
- systems/: Magic systems and mechanical rules
- lore/: Detailed background stories and history
- bestiary/: Creatures and spirit ecology
- characters/: Character development materials
- traveler_archive/: Traveler-specific content
- narrative_flow/: Story planning and structure
- scenes/: Draft scenes and chapters
- templates/: Reusable templates
- editorial/: Style guides and editorial processes
